pullrequest.title: Remove redundant call of WorldPlugin::Init from gazebo_2.2 branch (#1208)

content.raw:
Given that the test will need a custom plugin, it will be easier to add the test to the gazebo_3.1 branch, while targeting just the fix here to gazebo_2.2

I've added such a test in 488906d (branch issue_1208_3.1) and queued a [jenkins build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/35) for that branch
content.html:
